  • Constructor Details

    • Main

      public Main()
      Constructor method for initializing attributes or relationships

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

    • mainMenu

      public void mainMenu()

    • menu1

      public void menu1()
      In this method the user will be able to enter a menu, where he must choose what to do in the program. The global boolean variable is used to close the program when the user is able to do so.

    • petNurseryMenu

      public void petNurseryMenu()

    • addVeterinary

      public void addVeterinary()
      This method allows the user to add a veterinarian The relationship center is used to pass the veterinarian's data

    • deleteVeterinary

      public void deleteVeterinary()
      This method will allow the user to delete a veterinarian if the conditions for doing so are met. The center relationship is used to pass the unique number of the veterinarian, which will be used to eliminate the veterinarian.

    • addPetandOwner

      public void addPetandOwner()
      This method allows the user to register a pet and its owner. The center relationship is used to pass all the owner and pet data, and create the object

    • removePet

      public void removePet()
      This method will allow the user to take a pet out of the center. The center relation sends the data to the class method of the model and removes the pet.

    • startConsultation

      public void startConsultation()
      This method allows the user to initiate a veterinary consultation. The relationship center is used to send the id of the veterinarian who will do the consultation.

    • endConsultation

      public void endConsultation()
      This method allows to finalize a veterinary consultation previously started. The relationship center is used to send the veterinarian and pet data to the method that completes the consultation.

    • endDayReports

      public void endDayReports()
      This method shows all the reports to end the day. If the condition is met, the boolean data type "continued" changes and closes the program.

    • notAttendedPets

      public void notAttendedPets()
      This method counts unattended pets and displays them to the user. Relationship center calls the method that counts the mascot

    • veterinaryMostAttendPets

      public void veterinaryMostAttendPets()
      This method obtains the veterinarian with the most consultations. The relationship center gets the veterinarian by calling the method

    • attendsPetsForPriority

      public void attendsPetsForPriority()
      This method counts each pet by priority The center relation is used to call a method and assign it to an array to display the data.

    • notAttendPercentage

      public void notAttendPercentage()
      This method calculates the percentage of pets that left without being attended by a veterinarian. The center relation is used to call the method that calculates the percentage and displays it to the user.

    • deleteAttendedPets

      public void deleteAttendedPets()
      This method takes care of eliminating all pets once the day is over. The relationship center is used to call the method that is in charge of eliminating all pets.

    • addPetToNursery

      public void addPetToNursery()
      This method adds a pet to a habitat. Use the relationship center to send the pet data to the method that will make the habitat.

    • findPetInNursery

      public void findPetInNursery()
      The method, given the pet's name, searches the habitat and its information.

    • printMap

      public void printMap()
      This method paints the map of the nursery.

    • hopitalizationPet

      public void hopitalizationPet()
      This method sends a hospitalized pet to day care.

    • showHabitatInformation

      public void showHabitatInformation()
      This method shows the information of a habitat.

    • showNurseryStatistics

      public void showNurseryStatistics()
      This method displays the nursery statistics
